then.line: I've got it! I rememeber!
She'll want protein powder! Minty Muscles we call her.
Minty Muscles! Huh. Does she work out?
Well, she's definitely doing a lot of running today.
Well okay! And hey, I'm no dietician! Just a GP.
Perfect! Let's do it!
Now, if she's health-conscious, I bet she's gonna want good toppings on that, right?
Definitely.
What'll she have?
Okay! Gimme the ostrich patty!
Minty will have no birds but the biggest.
Wow, little dog, big taste. Love it.
You know what they say! It's not the size of the bird...
It's how you eat it!
They do say that, don't they? All right, let's slap that on...
Done! Next up, let's get her some fun toppings.
Hmmm... I think she'd go for ham!
She can't get enough of the classics.
Oh, sorry, we don't carry Ham Classic anymore. We've only got New Ham.
And Ham Zero. Is that cool?
... Is this a joke?
I guess not much of one. Ha!
Up next, toppings! What'll Minty munch on?
